description:
Step onto Autumn Isle, a tranquil hidden world where the leaves never stop falling and the air always feels crisp. Explore at your own pace as you wander through a peaceful landscape full of color, mystery, and calm.

There are no enemies, no time limits—just you, the island, and the rhythm of the seasons.

Features:
Wander freely – No rush, no pressure. Explore wherever your feet (or curiosity) take you.

Find hidden places – Cozy cabins, secret paths, and quiet overlooks to discover.

Calming sounds and music – A warm, ambient soundtrack to match every mood.
